name: When I Get Free
description:
Episode 1 features John, Peter, and Judas who are inmates in Nemean Prison. Watch and play as they initiate their elaborate plan to escape to freedom.

When I Get Free takes players on an interactive comic book adventure filled with adrenaline, puzzling mysteries, grave danger and characters inspired by the New Testament.

For feedback and comments, please email us at kenegutv@gmail.com
follow on instagram @kenegutv

You can also download to your phone from the App Store(ios). Just search "When I Get Free"
